name: Amiwalé
overview: Amiwalé is a wordplay on Awelé, one of the many names of the traditional Ghanaian board game Owale played around Africa and throughout the Caribbean. The game has a board and 48 seeds. The objective of the game is to capture more seeds than one's opponent. The game features extensive instructions on the rules how to play the game, mutiple difficulty levels and the possibility to make both players be played by the computer.
